definitions: (of a dead animal) having the skin filled with material to restore the original shape and appearance
shortDefinitions: (of dead animal) having skin filled with material to restore original shape and appearance

definitions: (of a toy) made of fabric stuffed with a soft filling

examples.text: she has a large collection of stuffed toys

shortDefinitions: (of toy) made of fabric stuffed with soft filling

definitions: (of an item of food) having the cavity filled with a savory or sweet mixture
shortDefinitions: (of item of food) having cavity filled with savoury or sweet mixture

definitions: having eaten to one's limits or satisfaction

examples.text: after all that food, I was stuffed
the pickles are splendid—you'll be stuffed by the time the meal arrives

shortDefinitions: having eaten to one's limits or satisfaction
